summary: Con artist Marilyn Fryser tries to sell bogus real estate deals in an area overrun by giant ants.
cast: Joan Collins|Robert Lansing|John David Carson|Albert Salmi|Jacqueline Scott|Pamela Susan Shoop|Robert Pine|Edward Power|Brooke Palance|Tom Fadden|Irene Tedrow|Harry Holcombe|Jack Kosslyn|Ilse Earl|Janie Gavin|Norman Franklin|Florance McGee|Jim Wheelus|Mike Armstrong|Tom Ford|Charles Redd|Carlo Martini|Marvin Miller
title: El imperio de las hormigas
